Topics Tx25 requests
previous Preventing accidental deletes
next The main page in Lino Welfare

Tx25 requests¶

“Transaction 25” or “Tx25” is an alias for the rather complicated name “RetrieveTIGroupsRequest” service at the CBSS. The short description of this CBSS connection for Lino Welfare service is “Interrogation sur certains types d’informations légales” (in Codes d’interrogations).

This module is being used in production since 2014 and handles all common information types.

See also:

  • Liste des types d’information (pdf)

  • Lijst van de informatietypes (pdf)

  • DGIP > Registre national > Instructions

Table of contents:

  • About this document

  • Supported information groups

  • The history of requests

  • Examples of Tx25 results

  • Printing a Tx25

About this document¶

>>> from lino import startup
>>> startup('lino_welfare.projects.gerd.settings.doctests')
>>> from lino.api.doctest import *

Supported information groups¶

Here is an incomplete list of the supported TIs (incomplete because the first handlers were written with an older syntax which did not worry about how to generate a documentation page for them):

>>> from lino_welfare.modlib.cbss.tx25 import HANDLERS
>>> tpl = u"{0} ({1}) : {2} "
>>> for name, v in sorted(HANDLERS.items(), key=lambda item: (item[1], item[0])):
...     label, subname, itname = v
...     print(tpl.format(name, itname, label))
... 
AddressDeclarationAbroad (IT018) : Adressdeklaration im Ausland
WorkPermits (IT198) : Arbeitsgenehmigungen
BurialModes (IT152) : Bestattungsarten
DocumentTypes (IT211) : Dokumentarten
RefugeeTypes (IT205) : Flüchtlingsart
StatusOfRefugee (IT206) : Flüchtlingsstatus
ChoosenResidences (IT212) : Gewählte Wohnsitze
Guardians (IT113) : Guardians
NameModifications (IT013) : Namesänderungen
PublicSecurityNumbers (IT200) : Nummer Öffentliche Sicherheit
OrganDonations (IT192) : Organspenden
ParentalAuthorities (IT111) : Parental authorities
RetirementCertificates (IT073) : Pensionszertifikate
PostalAddressAbroad (IT023) : Postadresse im Ausland
PseudoNationalNumbers (IT208) : Pseudo-Nationalnummern
RegistrationRegisters (IT210) : Registereintragung
Passports (IT199) : Reisepässe
ReturnPermissions (IT008) : Return permissions
SpecialRetirementCertificates (IT074) : Sonder-Pensionszertifikate
CountriesOfOrigin (IT006) : Ursprungsländer
ResidenceUpdateDates (IT251) : Wohnsitzänderungen
TemporaryAbsences (IT026) : Zeitweilige Abwesenheiten
TemporaryRegistrations (IT028) : Zeitweilige Einschreibungen
OrganizationsInCharge (IT207) : Zuständige Organisation
SpecialInfos (IT202) : Zusätzliche Informationen

The history of requests¶

Lino keeps track of every Tx25 request made.

>>> rt.show(cbss.RetrieveTIGroupsRequests,
...     column_names='user person environment status ticket')
... 
================= ========================= ======= ========= ======================================
 Autor             Klient                    T/A/B   Zustand   Ticket
----------------- ------------------------- ------- --------- --------------------------------------
 Hubert Huppertz   AUSDEMWALD Alfons (116)   demo    OK        db1521da-3a61-43c0-b500-e96e9dd5c0ee
 Hubert Huppertz   AUSDEMWALD Alfons (116)   demo    OK        770c5e7d-8555-4ddd-9787-4e4f416c3d21
 Hubert Huppertz   AUSDEMWALD Alfons (116)   demo    OK        cd241a8b-2092-4f0c-b9d9-53a3707cdc3d
 Hubert Huppertz   AUSDEMWALD Alfons (116)   demo    OK        5448d29b-7098-478c-b3ac-f3d51a86f658
 Hubert Huppertz   AUSDEMWALD Alfons (116)   demo    OK        fc9b0c4a-ed38-4938-bb17-ea8f05be90bc
 Hubert Huppertz   AUSDEMWALD Alfons (116)   demo    OK        42aa2b95-e25d-47a5-beb1-4e3aebc4f09e
================= ========================= ======= ========= ======================================

Since the responses of many CBSS requests contain confidential data about citizens, we have some rules for accessing this data.

  • Only the user who initiated the request can see the results.

  • Even the System Administrator cannot print nor see the detail of a CBSS request of other users.

  • Only a Security advisor can see all data. Lino keeps a journal of every login as a security advisor.

We retrieve Tx25 no. 1 from the database. User Hubert (the social agent who issued the request) can see the result:

>>> obj = cbss.RetrieveTIGroupsRequest.objects.get(pk=1)
>>> ses = rt.login('hubert')
>>> with translation.override('de'):
...    ses.show(cbss.RetrieveTIGroupsResult, obj)
============================== ===== ========== ====================================================================================================================================================================
 Gruppe                         TI    Seit       Information
------------------------------ ----- ---------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 NR-Nummer                            02.07.68   **68070201351** (Männlich)
 Wohnsitze                      001   18.10.01   **Estland** (136), Fusion: **0**, Sprache: **2**

 Erstelldatum                   253   05.09.15
 Zuletzt geändert               254   26.10.11
============================== ===== ========== ====================================================================================================================================================================

Any other user, even a site admin, cannot see the result:

>>> ses = rt.login('rolf')
>>> with translation.override('de'):
...    ses.show(cbss.RetrieveTIGroupsResult, obj, limit=5)
Confidential data

Except for users of the special user type who can see results of all requests (but the Lino log files keep track of when that user logged in).

Examples of Tx25 results¶

This section is mostly for testing purposes.

>>> ses = rt.login('hubert')
>>> def showit(pk):
...     obj = cbss.RetrieveTIGroupsRequest.objects.get(pk=pk)
...     with translation.override('de'):
...         ses.show(cbss.RetrieveTIGroupsResult, obj)
>>> showit(2)
